synopsis.text:
Asialand City, a vibrant urban landscape, finds itself in the throes of chaos as a sinister entity, the Stress Team, prowls its streets. This nefarious group preys on the city's overworked and anxious inhabitants, morphing them into terrifying monsters. In response, an unlikely trio of heroines emerges: Kate, Pop, and Kanoko, who transform into the formidable and adorable Sweet Valerians.

Initially aspiring for the freedom of the open road on their mopeds, the girls' lives take a dramatic turn when they encounter a cryptic figure who enlightens them about the city's perilous state. Inspired by this figure, they embark on a mission to combat the Stress Team's malevolent forces.

As the Sweet Valerians, these brave bunny warriors harness the power of relaxation to battle the monstrous manifestations of stress, from ramen beasts to other outlandish creatures. With their newfound abilities and unyielding determination, they strive to restore tranquility to their beloved city. Prepare for a thrilling and heartwarming adventure with the Relaxation Combat Team Valerian!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
